title: FS: A few T and E cards for sale

posts.post_title: FS: A few T and E cards for sale
posts.post_content: If interested, please email at [URL="andrewhahn55@gmail.com"]andrewhahn55@gmail.com[/URL], I would prefer payment by paypal gift or check. Please see link at bottom of page for scans and prices.
Are the T213-2 Stovall and Bradley cards $60 for the pair, or $60 each?  If sold as a pair, would you be willing to break them up?

[quote name="ngrow9" post=1026572]Are the T213-2 Stovall and Bradley cards $60 for the pair, or $60 each?  If sold as a pair, would you be willing to break them up?[/QUOTE]

Sorry about that, $60 for the pair.
updated with new scans and cards
bump for a few new cards added
Thanks to everyone for the purchases. All cards are mailed as of 12/20, have a great holiday!
